thing.title: 81:1 Gearbox 1.0
thing.author: MaskedRetriever
thing.description: If I'm measuring things right, this gear box should print at this size AND the gears should mesh.The motor is the same motor from the old shape library:allelectronics.com/make-a-store/item/DCM-296/SMALL-DC-MOTOR-MABUCHI/1.html
